#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
 char arr1[110] , arr2[110];
 int result[110] = {0};

 cin>> arr1 >> arr2;
while(arr1[0]!='0' && arr2[0]!='0')
{


 int len1 = strlen(arr1);
 int len2 = strlen(arr2);
 int k=0,temp=0 , temp1 =0 , temp2=0 , carry=0 ,i,j , count=0;;

 //cout<< len1 << " len " <<len2 << " le" << endl;

if(len1==len2)
{
    for( i=len1-1;i>=0;i--)
    {
        temp1 = int(arr1[i]-'0');
        temp2 = int(arr2[i]-'0');
        temp = temp1 + temp2 + carry;
        result[k++]  = temp%10;
        carry = temp/10;
       if(carry>0) count++;

    }
    if(carry!=0)
        while(carry)
    {
        result[k++] = carry%10;
        carry = carry/10;
        if(carry>0) count++;
    }
}

if(len1>len2)
{
    for(i=len1-1,j=len2-1;j>=0;i--,j--)
    {temp1 = int(arr1[i]-'0'); //cout<<" temp1 is : " << temp1 << endl;
        temp2 = int(arr2[j]-'0'); //cout<<" temp2 is : " << temp2 << endl;
        temp = temp1 + temp2 + carry;
       // cout<<"temp is " << temp << endl;
        result[k++]  = temp%10;
        carry = temp/10;

        if(carry>0) count++;
        }


 // cout<<  " i is : "<<i;
        while(i>=0)
        {
            temp = carry + int(arr1[i--]-'0'); //cout<<" temp later is " << temp << endl;
            result[k++] = temp%10;
            carry = temp/10;
            if(carry>0) count++;
        }
        if(carry!=0)
        while(carry)
    {
        result[k++] = carry%10;
        carry = carry/10;
        if(carry>0) count++;
    }


}

if(len2>len1)
{
    for(i=len2-1,j=len1-1;j>=0;i--,j--)
    {temp1 = int(arr2[i]-'0');// cout<<" temp1 is : " << temp1 << endl;
        temp2 = int(arr1[j]-'0');// cout<<" temp2 is : " << temp2 << endl;
        temp = temp1 + temp2 + carry;
       // cout<<"temp is " << temp << endl;
        result[k++]  = temp%10;
        carry = temp/10;
        if(carry>0) count++;}


 // cout<<  " i is : "<<i;
        while(i>=0)
        {
            temp = carry + int(arr2[i--]-'0'); //cout<<" temp later is " << temp << endl;
            result[k++] = temp%10;
            carry = temp/10; if(carry>0) count++;
        }
        if(carry!=0)
        while(carry)
    {
        result[k++] = carry%10;
        carry = carry/10; if(carry>0) count++;
    }


}


  if(count==0) cout<<"No carry operation." << endl;
  else if (count==1) printf("%d carry operation.\n",count);
  else printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
cin>> arr1 >> arr2;
}
 }
